words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H430 n.mp construct of אֱלֹהִים 'God'; KJV 'the God of', ESV 'the God of', NASB 'the God of'
H5680 def. art. + gentilic n.mp עִבְרִי 'Hebrew'; all trans. agree
H7122 Niphal perf. 3ms of קָרָא 'to meet, encounter'; KJV 'hath met', ESV 'has met', NASB 'has met'
H5921 prep. עַל + 1cp suff. 'upon us'; KJV 'with us', ESV 'with us', NASB 'with us'
H3212 Qal cohortative 1cp of הָלַךְ 'to go, walk'; KJV 'let us go', ESV 'please let us go', NASB 'let us go'
H4994 particle of entreaty נָא; KJV 'we pray thee', ESV 'please', NASB 'please'
H1870 n.ms דֶּרֶךְ 'way, road, journey'; KJV 'journey', ESV 'journey', NASB 'journey'
H7969 n.f construct שָׁלוֹשׁ 'three'; all trans. agree
H3117 n.mp יוֹם 'day'; all trans. agree
H4057 prep. b- + def. art. + n.ms מִדְבָּר 'wilderness'; KJV 'in the desert', ESV 'in the wilderness', NASB 'in the wilderness'
H2076 conj. + Qal cohortative 1cp of זָבַח 'to sacrifice'; KJV 'sacrifice', ESV 'sacrifice', NASB 'sacrifice'
H3068 prep. l- + divine name; KJV 'unto the LORD', ESV 'to the LORD', NASB 'to the LORD'
H430 n.mp construct + 1cp suff. of אֱלֹהִים 'God'; KJV 'our God', ESV 'our God', NASB 'our God'
H6435 conj. 'lest, otherwise'; KJV 'lest', ESV 'lest', NASB 'or else'
H6293 Qal impf. 3ms + 1cp suff. of פָּגַע 'to meet, strike'; KJV 'fall upon us', ESV 'fall upon us', NASB 'strike us'
H1698 prep. b- + def. art. + n.ms דֶּבֶר 'pestilence, plague'; KJV 'pestilence', ESV 'pestilence', NASB 'pestilence'
H2719 prep. b- + n.fs חֶרֶב 'sword'; KJV 'sword', ESV 'sword', NASB 'sword'
